summary: Solution-focused Senior Backend Engineer with 4+ years of experience designing scalable, secure, and high-performance systems. Adept at building microservices using Node.js, optimizing cloud infrastructures, and implementing robust DevOps practices to elevate reliability. Accomplished in tackling complex problems (Top 2.5% on LeetCode) and guiding cross-functional teams, with a knack for delivering real-world impact in agile, fast-paced environments.

details: üèÖ GPA: 3.79, Top 4% of class.
Developed deep expertise in data structures and algorithms (e.g., trees, graphs, Dijkstra‚Äôs) using Python, Go, and C++, consistently delivering high-performance solutions.
Ranked in Top 2.5% on LeetCode and Codeforces by solving 1,000+ algorithmic challenges, illustrating a strong commitment to problem-solving and collaboration.
Spearhead the design and development of a microservices-based platform, integrating Node.js and Flask to process large-scale video annotations and analytics with high throughput.
Improve system reliability through containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and AWS-based auto-scaling (EC2, Lambda, RDS), reducing latency by 30% under peak loads.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement secure RESTful APIs, leverage Celery for async task execution, and conduct regular code reviews ensuring best-in-class standards.

items.role: Africa to Silicon Valley | Head of Education & Senior Software Engineer
details: Oversaw backend architecture for RateEat using Node.js and Nest.js on GCP with MongoDB and Redis, pioneering one of Addis Ababa‚Äôs first scalable food delivery and rating platforms.
Instituted robust security measures (JWT, OAuth) and microservices design, resulting in a 20% increase in uptime and faster feature rollouts for mission-critical applications.
Led mentorship initiatives by coaching junior developers on container orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes) and agile workflows, fostering a culture of continuous learning.
Implemented modular, secure APIs with Flask, SQLAlchemy, and JWT/OAuth, ensuring compliance with industry best practices for data protection and privacy.
Deployed CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions) to automate testing (Selenium, Jest, Cypress) and expedite release cycles, reducing production bugs by over 15%.
Orchestrated Kubernetes clusters to streamline environment consistency, boosting system resiliency and minimizing service downtime.
Reinforced fintech-oriented payment services by integrating Go-based backends for higher fault tolerance and load handling.
Led cloud infrastructure deployment on AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS), enhancing transaction speed and data security for local merchants.
Developed a Node.js and React-powered platform for dynamic restaurant ratings and reviews, improving user engagement through real-time updates and intuitive UI components.
Programming Languages: Node.js, Python, Go, JavaScript, TypeScript, C/C++, Bash/Shell scripting
Web & Backend: Express.js, Nest.js, Flask, Django, RESTful APIs, GraphQL, WebSockets, Microservices
Databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis, SQL/NoSQL Optimization
Cloud & DevOps: AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, EKS), Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Jenkins, Terraform (basic exposure)
Security & Performance: OAuth/JWT, Encryption, Automated Testing (Jest, Cypress), CI/CD Pipelines, Monitoring Tools
Recognized in the Top 2.5% globally on LeetCode, validating advanced algorithmic and coding capabilities.
Awarded $1000 in a month-long A2SV Coding Competition, demonstrating persistence, innovation, and high-impact problem-solving in a team setting.
